description: Subtracts the Mean and divides by the Standard Deviation of a data set. Also called autoscaling or z-transformation.
name: Scale

properties.name: scale
properties.description: If scale is TRUE then scaling is done by dividing the (centered) row of x by their standard deviations if center is TRUE, and the root mean square otherwise. If scale is FALSE, no scaling is done.

properties.name: center
properties.description: If center is TRUE then centering is done by subtracting the row means (omitting NAs) of x from their corresponding columns, and if center is FALSE, no centering is done.
